UtilityClasses — Various utility functions¶

This module provides various utility functions.

Module Syntax¶

Empty.

Module Contents¶

class UtilityClasses.Progress_bar¶

This class builds a nice progress bar:

0%                                    100%
#                                        #
#********                                #
#********************                    #

There are 50 characters between the #.

add()¶

Docstring missing.

class UtilityClasses.Fix_xxmer¶

This class fixes xxmers, where xx copies of one protein are in one pdb.

hack_linenumbering()¶

Docstring missing.

hack_chain_ids()¶

Make double occuring chain ids unique!

class UtilityClasses.ESP_Profile_Manager¶

This class writes ESP-profiles to file.

write_profile(box, indices, id, filename, append = False)¶
Parameters:
  • box – array with 3 dimensions
  • indices – tupel of arrays, which you get for example with Numpy.nonzero(a==1)()
  • id – identifier for one ESP-profile in case you want to append it to an existing file
  • append – True or False

The formatting looks like this (seperated by \t):

X        [coord_1    coord_2_... coord_n]
Y        [coord_1    coord_2_... coord_n]
Z        [coord_1    coord_2_... coord_n]
[ID_1]   [phi_1        phi_2 ...   phi_n]
read_hull_coordinates(hull_coordinates_file, phi_values = False, id = 1)¶

Docstring missing.

write_hull_coordinates(hull_coordinates, filename = 'hull_coordinates.txt')¶

Docstring missing.
